channel.title: linux on Today I Learned
channel.description: Recent content in linux on Today I Learned

item.title: ELF library loading
item.description: TIL about the algorithm an interpreter uses in order to load libraries in which your ELF file depends on: The interpreter locates the libraries in this order: LD_PRELOAD environment variable, and anything in /etc/ld.so.preload LD_LIBRARY_PATH environment variable DT_RUNPATH or DT_RPATH specified in the binary file (both can be modified with patchelf) system-wide configuration (/etc/ld.so.conf) /lib and /usr/lib
